title: Each unit with its own DNA and original structure!
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

title: Located in the Heart of Fishtown
description:
It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. Located in the Heart of Fishtown, along the Delaware River, anchored by Commercial Mixed Use Corridors, including South St, and surrounded by residential properties, this property is situated at the intersection of a quaint & quiet neighborhood. This 3 story new construction townhouse features high end finishes and rooftop space. There is currently an occupant in the building and we are searching for 2 additional roommates. There is a 1 bedroom with a shared bathroom on the 2nd floor renting for $1050/month and a 3rd story bedroom loft with private en suite bathroom renting for $1475/month. All occupants will have access to the rooftop and backyard space and common living area (kitchen, living room, and dining room) The main floor features hardwood floors with high end finishes and lacquer cabinetry & open space that leads into a private backyard space. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. To apply, we are running credit reports, criminal backgrounds, eviction history, and reviewing all income & financial documentation. If you are selected as a tenant, we will collect first, last & security deposit(one month). There are no minimum score requirements. The entire financial and credit profile will be reviewed in its entirety to determine application viability. We look forward to doing business with you and we will ensure a smooth, efficient, and professional process for all parties. Thank you for the opportunity to showcase this home and we wish you the best of luck in your home search.

title: This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!!
description:
** 2 Car PARKING ** This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!! It is the premier unit in the Candy Factory Lofts. Light floods in the large and many windows at every time of day. The kitchen, dining area, and living room comprise the very large open floor plan with 14 ft. ceilings. The designer kitchen has stainless cabinets, granite countertops, and maple floors running throughout. The very large master bedroom has a walk-in closet. The second bedroom is also plenty of roomy. The bathroom is smartly designed to function as a full bathroom but can be sectioned off by a sliding door to make it a powder room, a great feature for entertaining. This is only one of 2 units in the building that has its own private deck. It is accessed by a spiral stair in the living room area. The unobstructed deck views go for miles in every direction. There is a large coat closet/storage closet that also houses the laundry room just off the front hallway. The 2 Car PARKING is covered and gated!!! Common bike storage on the first floor. A short walk/ride takes you to all of Fishtown's new restaurants and shops. Easy walk to the Market-Frankford El and the trolley.
1125 E Columbia Ave #301

title: Brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia!
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! This is a quick walk to La Chinesca, Café Lift, Yards Brewery, Love City Brewery, Triple Bottom Brewery, Lucky Well, Juno, Reading Terminal, the newly built rail park, and many many more great establishments/destinations!

title: Available NOW! Super Charming 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath Home for Rent!
description:
Gorgeous 3-Bedroom Townhome in West Philadelphia! - This 3-Bedroom/2-Bathroom (1 full, 2 powder rooms) Townhome is located in the Kingsessing neighborhood of West Philadelphia. This home has been recently renovated and includes all the high-end features you could possibly be looking for in your next home! This home is available NOW and ready for immediate move-in!
Arrive the home and immediately fall in love with the large front porch welcoming you into the home. Once inside, you will be greeted with an open concept floor plan from the living room all the way into the kitchen. With an unobstructed sightline, this is the perfect set up for when you're entertaining guests or hosting holidays! The living room is spacious enough to accommodate a sofa, coffee table, TV stand and more. Off the back of the living room is the dining area which can accommodate a six-seat dining set with ease!
The kitchen has been recently renovated and looks absolutely stunning. It includes stone tile flooring, white cabinets with gold hardware, granite countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, four-burner gas range, and a microwave. There is plenty of storage space throughout the cabinets and enough counterspace to prepare any meal you can imagine. There is also a subway tile backsplash which adds the perfect pop of character to the space and brings the entire design together!
All three bedrooms are a comfortable size and include original hardwood flooring, ample closet space, and ceiling fans which are perfect for air circulation. They all include newer windows which allow plenty of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly open and bright! Additionally, each bedroom is large enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed with ease.
The full bathroom is located in the hallway and looks absolutely gorgeous. It has been recently renovated with stone tile flooring, modern vanity with plenty of storage, and a trendy light fixture. There is also a full-sized bathtub/shower with a custom tile surround that extends along the perimeter of the entire bathroom. This bathroom truly feels like having a spa inside your own home!
In addition to all the great features throughout the home, there is also a finished basement which acts as the perfect bonus space. Whether it's used as an additional living area, playroom. or for storage, you will love having this extra space! There is a second powder room included on the basement level for added convenience.
Tenants are responsible for electric, gas, water, and cable/internet in addition to rent each month.
